title: Quarkus 1.11.3.Final released - Bugfixes
content: 1.11.3.Final mainly fixes a regression introduced in 1.11.2.Final that makes it impossible to build native executables while using both the RESTEasy and OpenTracing extensions. It is a safe upgrade for everyone using Quarkus 1.11. If you are not using 1.11 already, please refer to the 1.11 migration guide. You can...
